purpose: Announce Titanverse partnership with DemDx for clinical pathways integration, positioning DemDx-powered clinical pathways as globally recognized, clinically trusted, and evidence-based solution built into consultation flow.
core_message: Clinical pathways powered by DemDx and trusted by doctors worldwide are built into your consult flow. Less tab-hopping. More clarity. Safer care.
summary: Single image product partnership announcement showcasing Titanverse integration with DemDx for clinical pathways. Visual demonstrates partnership through illustrated hands reaching toward each other, emphasizing globally recognized, clinically trusted, evidence-based clinical pathways built into consultation workflow.
audience: Prospects interested in clinical decision support
